content:
Dataverse 6.8 is now available! Highlights include:

  • Open OnDemand integration
  • Logs for diagnosing PID failures
  • Link permission split off from publish permission
  • New and improved APIs
  • Bug fixes

Thank you to all community members who contributed code, suggestions, bug reports, and other assistance across the project.

View release details and upgrade instructions here: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/releases/tag/v6.8

Enjoy and have a good weekend!
